message: Welcome! This is my first product, and I'm excited to offer it to you. I assure you that I will always be honest about the quality of my products... in the future. For now, I'll let you decide the quality of this one. Are you willing to take a chance?
I'll take the risk and buy the product. I'm excited to see its quality!

Hello! I've sold one product so far, but I must inform you that the previous buyer took a risk without knowing its quality. I'm still building my selling record, and I assure you that I'll be transparent about my products' quality... eventually. Are you willing to take a chance on this one?
I'll take a chance, but I'd appreciate it if you could provide some information about the previous sale. What was the quality of the product sold to the first buyer?

The second buyer also took a chance without knowing the quality, and I must inform you that it was also low-quality. However, I'm excited to say that this third product is a game-changer. I'm not saying anything more, but I'm confident that you won't be disappointed.

Given that two out of the first three products were low-quality, I'd like to see more evidence before making a purchase. Can you provide more information about the sales process, like the probability of a product being high-quality based on your past sales record?
